original_text: But they will join together to attack the Philistines in the west. They will also attack the nations to the east of Israel. They will take their valuable things for themselves. They will win against the people of Edom and Moab. They will rule over the Ammonites.
korean_text: 그들이 서쪽으로 블레셋 사람들의 어깨에 날아 앉고 함께 동방 백성을 노략하며 에돔과 모압에 손을 대며 암몬 자손을 자기에게 복종시키리라

sentences.original_text: to attack the Philistines in the west
They will also attack the nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 여러 나라들을 공격할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will take their valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 귀중한 것들을 가져갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will win against the people of Edom
They will rule over the Ammonites
